title: Mystery Figures - Merch Shop

embed.description: Unlock a random Series 1 figure from remaining in-stock figures before they are gone. Figures can only be exchanged for the same figure.

body: It is written that the Mystery figures are series 1, and I would like to know what are the possibilities. Is there any list of possible champions anywhere, because I have no idea what champion are Series 1.

replies.body: I believe that the series 1 figures include all of the basic figures that are still in stock.  For example, it wouldn't include figures like Firecracker Jinx or Championship Thresh.  I hope that helps clear things up!
